oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Month promos - Big M Radio - WMTS
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of various country music month promos and salutes to various Hall of Fame members and country music executives, announced by unidentified male announcers for Big M Radio and radio station WMTS (Murfreesboro, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Country Music Month promo saluting Fred Rose -- Country Music Month promo saluting Hank Williams -- Country Music Month promo saluting Jimmie Rodgers -- Country Music Month promo saluting Roy Acuff -- Country Music Month promo saluting Tex Ritter -- Country Music Month promo saluting Ernest Tubb -- Country Music Month promo saluting George D. Hay -- Country Music Month promo saluting Jim Denny -- Country Music Month promo saluting Uncle Dave Macon -- Country Music Month promo saluting Eddy Arnold -- Country Music Month promo saluting Jay L. Frank -- Country Music Month promo saluting Steven H. Shoales -- Country Music Month promo saluting Red Foley -- Country Music Month promo saluting Jim Reeves -- Country Music Month promo saluting Bob Wills -- Country Music Month promo saluting Gene Autry -- Country Music Month promo saluting the Carter Family -- Country Music Month promo saluting Bill Monroe
